column5: Controls the vibrato effect applied to the sound
Adjusts the volume of the program
column15: Controls volume for both KEYBOARDS and ENSEMBLE sections. Acts differently on organ programs, controlling volume before rotary speaker.

column5: Adjusts the volume of the program
column15: Controls volume for both KEYBOARDS and ENSEMBLE sections. Program volume is a combination of LEVEL knob value, CC#7 (Volume) and CC#11 (Expression).

column5: Controls the stereo position of the sound
column15: Controls panpot for both KEYBOARDS and ENSEMBLE sections. Can be assigned to foot pedal in system settings.
Default: Damper pedal (DS-1H). Half-damper effect supported with DS-1H. Can be toggled On/Off per section via EDIT menu.
column16: 0-63: Off; 64-127: On (values support half-damper with DS-1H)

column5: Controls the SW1 effect for each program
column15: Default: SW1 button. For layer/split, only transmitted/received via global MIDI channel and only enabled for KEYBOARDS section.

column5: Controls the SW2 effect for each program
column15: Default: SW2 button. For layer/split, only transmitted/received via global MIDI channel and only enabled for KEYBOARDS section.
Can be assigned to foot switch in system settings.
Can be assigned to foot switch in system settings.

column5: Turns off all notes on the specified channel
column15: Reception only; cannot be transmitted. Notes are turned off naturally, allowing decay portion to be heard.

column5: Forcibly stops all sound on the specified channel
column15: Reception only; cannot be transmitted. Forcibly stops all sound, decay portion will not be heard. For emergency use only.

column5: Resets all controller values to zero
